ygData.subject: Brain's ideas.
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow, active list.  I think the consensus is don t take away Shadow Step, I love that spell.  On the issue of making Humans and DE SKs more powerful while not
ygData.messageBody:
Wow, active list. I think the consensus is don't take away Shadow Step, I
love that spell. On the issue of making Humans and DE SKs more powerful
while not overpowering Trolls and Ogres, I think more useful combat spells
will solve this. If we got a lifetap and/or another stackable DOT spell,
the humans and DE will cast it much more because of their higher INT. I
don't think Ogres and Trolls will be able to utilize it too many times in a
battle. I just like the idea of a Shadow Knight SUCKING life out of his
opponents.
